name: Register a new Waiting List users from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically register a new user to Waiting List. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JxwU7p62bOqKlH4-iNpGnnbaeIgmACJiGLiRKcFLc14/edit?usp=sharing).
